title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 630.5 - Community relations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 630.5 - Community relations

State Regulations

The center shall respond to community needs and gain its
support for the center's goals, services and needs through outreach and
dialogue with community groups and a consciously structured community public
relations program designed to sharpen and enhance public understanding of the
agency's purposes and achievements. The center shall establish an advisory
board representative of the geographic and socio-economic makeup of the
community. Such board shall have displaced homemakers as
members. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
630.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
